onAttachedToWindow().Description: Called when the window has been attached to the window manager. See @B_android#view#View#onAttachedToWindow_E@ for more information.

Parameters: CharSequence: The new text to display in the title.
setTitle(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set the title text for this dialog's window.

refreshRoutes().Description: Refreshes the list of routes that are shown in the chooser dialog.

getRouteSelector().Description: Gets the media route selector for filtering the routes that the user can select.

Parameters: Bundle: If this dialog is being reinitialized after a the hosting activity was previously shut down, holds the result from the most recent call to @B_android#app#Dialog#onSaveInstanceState_E@, or null if this is the first time.
onCreate(android.os.Bundle).Description: Similar to @B_android#app#Activity#onCreate_E@, you should initialize your dialog in this method, including calling @B_android#app#Dialog#setContentView_E@.

Parameters: int: the title's text resource identifier
setTitle(int).Description: Set the title text for this dialog's window. The text is retrieved from the resources with the supplied identifier.

onDetachedFromWindow().Description: Called when the window has been attached to the window manager. See @B_android#view#View#onDetachedFromWindow_E@ for more information.

ClassDesc: This class implements the route chooser dialog for @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter_E@. This dialog allows the user to choose a route that matches a given selector.
